channel.title: MJVC RSS Feed
channel.description: RSS feed for Marcell Vazquez-Chanlatte's website/blog/publications/etc.

item.title: Started RSS feed for website updates.
item.description: Started RSS feed for website updates. Will provide updates on various Marcell related things :).

item.title: CAV 2020
item.description: My paper on Maximum Causal Entropy Specification Inference from Demonstrations was accepted (with very positive reviews) into CAV 2020! Unfortunately, the py-aiger tool paper did not fair as well. C'est la vie I suppose. Particularly during these trying times.

item.title: New Profile Image
item.description: Thanks to Dr. Elizabeth Polgreen, I have a new profile picture! It's based on the original one, but is now an svg (just incase you need arbitrary resolution).

channel.title: CAV 2020 talk
channel.description: Added link to CAV 2020 on Maximum Causal Entropy Specification Inference.

item.title: CAV 2021 and RSS 2021
item.description:
Added RSS 2021 paper on Entropy Guided Control Improvisation. Check out the video and paper for details!
Also added CAV 2021 paper on model checking finite-horizon properties using BDDs (see CAV 2020 paper for more general MDP case.)

channel.title: I graduated!
channel.description: I am offically Dr. Marcell Vazquez-Chanlatte.
